meanings.sent1: The saprophagous beetle happily consumed the rotting leaves.
meanings.sent2: The saprophagous fungi play a crucial role in breaking down dead plants.
meanings.sent3: The saprophagous worms threw a party in the compost bin.
meanings.sent4: The saprophagous bacteria worked tirelessly to clean up the decaying matter.
meanings.sent5: The saprophagous vulture swooped down to feast on the carcass.

meanings.definition: Organisms that obtain nutrients from dead or decaying organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The saprophagous in the forest help recycle nutrients from fallen trees.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study saprophagous to understand the decomposition process.
meanings.sent3: The saprophagous at the bottom of the food chain have an important job.
meanings.sent4: The saprophagous of the sea floor are like nature's cleanup crew.
meanings.sent5: The saprophagous insects buzzed around the decaying fruit.
